subject: Re: New website job: adding articles to news page + QA testing commencement
preview: Thank you Sophie!   Glad we could help you, our team will be sending the invoice shortly to g.johnston@investmenttrends.com  Let us know if there's anything else that we can help

full_threads.body:
Thank you Sophie!

Glad we could help you, our team will be sending the invoice shortly to g.johnston@investmenttrends.com

Let us know if there's anything else that we can help

Thanks Team - this is perfect.

If you can send invoice to g.johnston@investmenttrends.com

Thanks

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)
• closing for now for inbox - completed the task

Hi Sophie,

Thank you so much for your patience.

Just confirming we've added the 100 recent articles here: https://niwart.tech/investmenttrends/news/ - currently kept private for now.

Please let us know if this looks okay for you. Always happy to help.

Hi Team - any chance this will be completed today?

I really need to get this to the CEO today for review.

Thanks
Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie,

Thanks for clarifying, I’ll make sure to use only the publisher name (in uppercase) instead of the journalist’s name, e.g., NEWS DAILY, to make it stand out.

I’ll also ensure the past 100 most recent articles uploaded today are included, starting from the latest posts rather than back in 2021 as per my earlier example.

Will keep you updated once this is ready.

Also I would like the past 100 MOST RECENT articles uploaded today please. Do not start from 2021 as per your example.

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

This is perfect but please don't feature the journos name - can you please only put the publishers name and I was thinking in upper case to make it stand out?

Make sense?

Thanks
Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie,

We’ve made a bit of a start, following the style in here: https://niwart.tech/investmenttrends/news/

Before we move forward, could you confirm whether you’d like us to create a dedicated cover photo for each item, or simply use the featured image?

Once we have your confirmation, we’ll proceed with producing more.

Thanks so much - perhaps if you could send me a quick mail once you have done the first 10 and I can jump in just to make sure it all looks 100% - am sure it is all very straightforward from your perspective though.

Thanks again.

Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie,

Thank you so much for sending through the instructions and the file — we’ve received everything clearly. We’ve started looking into the uploads, and all the details make sense.

We’ll be able to finalise this by tomorrow at the latest, and we’ll keep you updated as soon as it’s completed.

Really appreciate you confirming with us, and we’ll make sure it’s all actioned smoothly.

Hello can you confirm you have have successfully received the information below and if you are starting to action

Does everything make sense?

Could you kindly confirm with me today please?

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi there - please find all the instructions you need to upload the past 100 articles to the website.

We will need help with more over time, but these are the priority.

If you can finalise the updates today it would be appreciated.

Thanks
Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie,

Happy Monday! 🌼

No worries at all, we’ll hold off for now and wait for your update tomorrow. Once we receive your instructions, we’ll make sure everything is actioned quickly so it’s ready by COB Tuesday.

Thanks again for pulling this together for us, really appreciate it.

Hi Team

Re work on the News Page on our new website.

I am pulling together full instructions so it is 100% clear on what you need to do - can we please hold on this work so we start work on this first thing Tuesday and complete by COB tomorrow?
I have tested the experience and have a quick question for my web team who will only be online at 4pm today.

I really appreciate you actioning this one so quickly for me tomorrow.

I am keen to share the website with the business for final review COB Tuesday.

Thanks
Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie,

Apologies for any confusion in my earlier email, I just wanted to clarify my question.

Would you like us to:
  • Recreate something similar to the Investment Trends “In the News” page on the new site, or
  • Simply add the articles into the back-end via importing for now?

Just let us know what feels easiest for you, and we’ll take care of it.

Thanks again for confirming earlier.

Let us know if there's anything else we can help with, always happy to help.
